data.eml:eml: The morphological and molecular identity of Longidoruspiceicola Liskova, Robbins & Brown, 1997 from Romania (Nematoda, Dorylaimida)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Groza, Mariana, Lazarova, Stela, Luca, Francesca De, Fanelli, Elena, Milka Elshishka,, Radoslavov, Georgi, Hristov, Peter, Coman, Mihaela, Peneva, Vlada (2017): The morphological and molecular identity of Longidoruspiceicola Liskova, Robbins & Brown, 1997 from Romania (Nematoda, Dorylaimida). ZooKeys 667: 1-19, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.667.12011, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.667.12011
